levels.description: Releases a shockwave in an area around this unit. All hit enemies receive <@ba.vup>{atk_scale[normal]:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage and are <$ba.root>Bound</> for <@ba.vup>{frozen}</> seconds. If the target is a [Drone], it will receive double damage and be <$ba.stun>Stunned</>
